quest.name: Leia's Legacy
journal: Luquelot at Bentbranch Meadows seeks your assistance in finding a lost chocobo egg.

Luquelot informs you that an egg has been stolen from the stables. The lost egg appears to be of great importance to Luquelot. Question the people of Bentbranch Meadows and see what clues you can uncover as to its whereabouts.
You have finished questioning the ranch workers. Report your findings to Luquelot.
The egg thief appears to be a man from Luquelot's homeland of Ishgard. Follow the thief's trail to the Tam–Tara Deepcroft, and retrieve Leia's egg.
You emerge victorious from your confrontation with the egg thief. Take possession of Leia's egg.
Return Leia's egg to Luquelot at Bentbranch Meadows.
You have retrieved Leia's egg and returned it to Bentbranch Meadows, much to the relief of everyone at the ranch. Speak with Luquelot, who will doubtless want to reward you.

Having thanked you profusely for your assistance, Luquelot reveals that he bore witness to a most alarming sight while you were away. Given the obvious depth of his concern, it may be wise to ask the worried Elezen to relate the details.
objectives: Question the people of Bentbranch Meadows.
Subdue the thief, and take back Leia's egg.
Defeat Janremi Blackheart and his band!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To accept this quest, you must abandon the current main scenario quest. Open the corresponding entry in the journal or duty list and select “Abandon.”

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: No! Oh, please gods, no! Leia's egg!

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: Forename, you must help me! I stepped out of the stables for but a moment, and when I returned it was gone!

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: I─ What was gone? An egg! Sorry? You are sure the chocobos will lay another!? Gah! You do not understand─the egg is extremely valuable! I must find it!

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: You will help me, won't you, Forename? Oh, thank you, thank you!

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: Someone must have made off with it. There can be no other explanation. I shall scour every ilm of the stable once more just to be sure. While I do so, I should be very grateful if you would ask the others if they noticed anything unusual.

dialogue.name: LAODAIRE
dialogue.text: A chocobo egg has gone missing? Hm, well let me think.

dialogue.name: LAODAIRE
dialogue.text: Now that you mention it, the chocobos were making quite a racket earlier. So much so, in fact, that I ran over to check on them, almost flattening a passing peddler in my haste. I didn't find anything out of the ordinary, though.

dialogue.name: LAODAIRE
dialogue.text: Hm? Could I describe the peddler? Oh...he was an Elezen fellow─didn't recognize his face. Seemed awfully twitchy. Oh gods, you don't think he...? Why in the hells didn't I accost him!?

dialogue.name: BERNARD
dialogue.text: Have I seen any odd characters about? Aside from yourself, you mean? Not that I recall.

dialogue.name: BERNARD
dialogue.text: I did see someone calming the birds, but only from a distance. I assumed it was Luquelot...

dialogue.name: BERNARD
dialogue.text: But if you say he was away from the stables at the time...then who was that with the chocobos?

dialogue.name: EWMOND
dialogue.text: See anyone actin' suspicious? I most certainly did, lasslad. A man, it was, runnin' off towards the Tam–Tara Deepcroft.

dialogue.name: EWMOND
dialogue.text: Hm? You say an egg was took? Then I'd say that there was yer culprit.

dialogue.name: EWMOND
dialogue.text: But why would anyone pinch a chocobo egg? Without the proper learnin', it's damn near impossible to get one to hatch.

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: There can be no mistake, then. The egg was indeed stolen.

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: And from what you have told me, this was no simple robbery.

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: That the culprit should take only Leia's egg and disregard all the rest tells me we are dealing with someone well versed in chocobo breeding. I am sorry to say that the individual in question is like to be a citizen of my native Ishgard.

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: Leia, you see, is of the bloodline of Ouranos─one of the greatest birds ever to grace an Ishgardian stable.

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: Many a man in my homeland would give his right arm to possess one of Leia's eggs... Gods, I should have foreseen this! We must give chase at once!

dialogue.name: KEITHA
dialogue.text: Hold your chocobos, Luquelot! If this egg thief's from Ishgard, like you say, why'd he go runnin' off towards the Tam–Tara Deepcroft? Unless I've got me mental map upside down, that's the opposite direction.

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: W-Well, yes, but...he may seek to lay a false trail, or...uh... Bah! The why of it is not important! Leia's egg is all that matters! Adventurer, I beg of you, hunt the scoundrel down and take back what he stole!

dialogue.name: KEITHA
dialogue.text: Well, at least you ain't plannin' on chasin' after him yourself...wherever he's from.

dialogue.name: KEITHA
dialogue.text: We may work wonders with our birds, Forename, but acts of derrin'-do ain't exactly our field. If you don't mind, we'll leave that end of things to you.

dialogue.name: KEITHA
dialogue.text: With luck, you may catch the thief on the road to the Tam–Tara Deepcroft, but do be careful─we cannot be certain he is working alone in this.

dialogue.name: JANREMI
dialogue.text: <pant> <wheeze> I have caught you at last, you spiteful imp! Now hand over the egg!

dialogue.name: KUPULUKOPO
dialogue.text: You can't have it, kupo! This egg belongs to Luquelot!

dialogue.name: JANREMI
dialogue.text: Who in Halone's bloody fury are you? Ah, those sops at Bentbranch hired themselves an adventurer, did they?

dialogue.name: JANREMI
dialogue.text: Yet another complication. This farce has gone on long enough. Kill the moogle and the farmers' hireling, and bring me that damned egg!

dialogue.name: KUPULUKOPO
dialogue.text: Thank you, kupo.

dialogue.name: KUPULUKOPO
dialogue.text: What's that, kupo? How did I come to be out here?

dialogue.name: KUPULUKOPO
dialogue.text: Ah, well, this egg here is Leia's. Leia is a very special chocobo, in case you didn't know. Anyway, I was having a nap in the stables when that nasty fellow crept in and tried to steal it, kupo!

dialogue.name: KUPULUKOPO
dialogue.text: So I snatched it up as quickly as I could and made a run for it. I was planning to take it back to Bentbranch Meadows myself, but it might be safer if you did it. I'm sure Luquelot will be very happy to see you, kupo!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You carefully receive Leia's egg.

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: Do you have the egg!? Is it safe!?

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: Yes, it has the right coloring, the right weight... It is most definitely Leia's egg.

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: I know not how to thank you.

dialogue.name: KEITHA
dialogue.text: You had me worried for a bit there, Forename. 'Tis good to see you and the egg back safe and sound.

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: ...So I was correct in my assumption that an Ishgardian was involved─albeit one who did not, in fact, make off with the egg. Well, I could hardly have anticipated the intervention of a moogle!

dialogue.name: KEITHA
dialogue.text: Bugger me... It couldn't be the same one...could it?

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: Might you have encountered our unlikely savior before, Keitha?

dialogue.name: KEITHA
dialogue.text: Could be, aye. One of 'em saved my hide back when the Calamity struck.

dialogue.name: KEITHA
dialogue.text: I was in a part of the woods what we now call the Standin' Corses that day. Seemed like the whole bleedin' forest was ablaze, and I couldn't see a yalm in front of me for all the smoke. Well-nigh given up hope, I had.

dialogue.name: KEITHA
dialogue.text: Then, all of a sudden, a moogle appears out of nowhere, tugs at me smolderin' sleeve, and leads me straight to a bit of the wood where the fire hadn't taken hold.

dialogue.name: KEITHA
dialogue.text: And now you know why the business is named “Moogle's Gift Mounts.” Seemed like the least I could do. I'd be dead if it weren't for that plucky little bugger.

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: Incredible. It may well be that the moogle has stood vigil over us ever since that day...

dialogue.name: KEITHA
dialogue.text: Ha! We'd better get back to work, then. Wouldn't want to go lettin' our guardian angel down, would we? Forename, you have our thanks. Oh, and I believe Luquelot wants to give you a little somethin' for your troubles.

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: Leia's egg is irreplaceable. I cannot well express to you the depth of my gratitude.

dialogue.name: LUQUELOT
dialogue.text: And yet, I find that I am still troubled... While this whole regrettable episode unfolded, I bore witness to a sight that greatly concerned me...

dialogue.name: INSTANCE
dialogue.text:
Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with
“Leia's Legacy”?

dialogue.name: INSTANCE
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: INSTANCE
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: JANREMI
dialogue.text: Meddlesome wretches... Prepare to die!

dialogue.name: JANREMI
dialogue.text: Ugh... She'sHe's tougher than shehe looks...

dialogue.name: JANREMI
dialogue.text: You'll feel this one, you obstinate cur!

dialogue.name: MOOGLE
dialogue.text: You'll not have Leia's egg, kupo!

dialogue.name: MOOGLE
dialogue.text: You're winning, kupo!

dialogue.name: MOOGLE
dialogue.text: Look out! He's up to something extra nasty, kupo!
